channel.title: Arrows
channel.description: How do i make my arrows/Bow Really strong like the perfect ring does to your melee weps, i tryed the same method with a certain arrow type and bow and it never made a difference??? how can i do this (if possible) [317 - Delta]

item.title: Arrows
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:4, topic:401807”][quote author=woffelz link=topic=498866.msg3648165#msg3648165 date=1309539882]
thats my problem, i have done that just like i did with the ring. but the ring does work
and the arrows don’t seem to work there just the same as normal
[/quote]
Well, try to power up your bow ;)[/quote]

Also Done that :sss, thanks for your help though

Read full topic

item.title: Arrows
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

woffelz:

How do i make my arrows/Bow Really strong like the perfect ring does to your melee weps, i tryed the same method with a certain arrow type and bow and it never made a difference??? how can i do this (if possible) [317 - Delta]

in item.cfg search for the arrow/bow id and then u will see.
id_name_info_then numbers
change the numbers after it it’s the bonuses. Make them higher to make you stronger/hit higher.

Read full topic
